title: Cloud Infrastructure Automation
description: A comprehensive solution for deploying and managing multi-cloud infrastructure using Terraform. Features automated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and containerized deployments with Docker.

title: Kubernetes Microservices Platform
description: A highly scalable and resilient microservices platform built on Kubernetes. Includes a service mesh with Istio for advanced traffic management, observability with Prometheus, and automated scaling.

title: Self-Service DevOps Platform
description: Empowers development teams with a self-service portal to create, deploy, and manage their applications. Automates testing, security scanning (SAST/DAST), and monitoring.

title: Cloud-Native E-commerce App
description: A modern e-commerce platform built from the ground up with a cloud-native, microservices-based architecture. Deployed on Kubernetes for scalability and resilience.

title: Multi-Cloud Disaster Recovery
description: An automated disaster recovery solution that provides business continuity across multiple cloud providers (AWS and Azure). Features real-time data replication and automated failover.

title: AI-Powered Anomaly Detection
description: An intelligent monitoring system that leverages machine learning to predict and prevent infrastructure issues. Uses TensorFlow for model training and integrates with Prometheus for real-time data.
